TheWord.Title: Their is a difference between singing I love You, and standing practicing I love You.

Remember.Commentary: Thornton Avenue Baptist Church "American Baptist" 4500 Thornton Avenue Fremont CA "Family Fun Day. One more day of summer. Saturday September 21 2-6pm". Celebrating the Voice of the Muslim Woman, Tayyibah Taylor, Publisher and Editor. Rod Stewart: First cut is the deepest. On the morning of 200209220800, the scripture reading will include (1 Kings 6-10). King Solomon will begin to build the house of God in 480th year of the release from bondage in Egypt, and in the 4th year of his reign, in the month of Zi which is the 2nd month. 480 years is the equilvalent of 12 generations (1 Kings 6:3, Luke 2:42). King Solomon will complete building the house of God in 487th year of the release from bondage in Egypt, and in the 11th year of his reign, in the month of Bul which is the 8th month (1 Kings 6:38). King Solomon will build his house for 13 years (1 Kings 7:1). On the morning of 200209220800, the scripture interpretation: I will first visit London, United Kingdom, as a 10 year old in 1978. I will plan to visit the United States but my mother will request Visa denial. During this visit to the United Kingdom, Uncle Rod Roderick, will demonstrate the electric toothbrush. 13 years later I will re-locate to Australia. I will first visit the United States as a 12 year old in 1980. Immediately prior to my 24th birthday, I will re-locate to Australia as a resident. After 2 years in Australia, I am an Australian citizen, and I will live in Australia for 7 years. 480 years is equilvalent to 12 generations. I will visit the United States in my 12th year, and I will re-locate to Australia in my 24th year. 352 days: 11 biblical months and 22 days.
